title: Authors and Citation
text: Chuche N (2024). timemoir: Check Memory Used Function. R package version 0.2.0.9000, https://nbc.github.io/timemoir/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {timemoir: Check Memory Used By Function},   author = {Nicolas Chuche},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.2.0.9000},   url = {https://nbc.github.io/timemoir/}, }

title: Check Memory Used By Function
text: goal timemoir get memory usage large functions many things (like duckdb arrow calculation). utils::Rprof profmem don’t work well use case. achieve goal, timemoir fork R processus execute function main processus read memory usage /proc/<pid>/status. bit crude works well . package reads /proc/<pid>/status, doesn’t work windows.

title: Check Memory Used By Function
text: can install development version timemoir like :

title: Check Memory Used By Function
code: library(timemoir)  my_fun <- function(sec) {   Sys.sleep(sec) }  rbind(timemoir(my_fun(1)), timemoir(my_fun(2)), timemoir(my_fun())) #> # A tibble: 3 × 4 #>   fname     duration error                                          max_mem #>   <chr>        <dbl> <chr>                                            <dbl> #> 1 my_fun(1)     1.00  <NA>                                            81932 #> 2 my_fun(2)     2.00  <NA>                                            82364 #> 3 my_fun()     NA    "argument \"sec\" is missing, with no default"   81852

title: timemoir — timemoir
text: launch xfun background watch pid file get max memory

title: timemoir — timemoir
text: xfun function test flag_file flag file use check xfun finished

title: timemoir — timemoir
text: tibble `fname`, function name (string) passed   `timemoir`, max_mem` max used memory, `duration` duration   function (NA function fails) `error`, error message   function fails (NA function pass)

title: timemoir — timemoir
code: my_fun <- function(sec) {   Sys.sleep(sec)   return(TRUE) }  rbind(timemoir(my_fun(1)), timemoir(my_fun())) #> # A tibble: 2 × 4 #>   fname     duration error                                          max_mem #>   <chr>        <dbl> <chr>                                            <dbl> #> 1 my_fun(1)     1.00  NA                                             202636 #> 2 my_fun()     NA    "argument \"sec\" is missing, with no default"  202200
